评论概述: The bust area is way too tight unless you have smaller breasts
评论详情: I ordered this dress planning to wear it to a concert so I was not too concerned over the material being thin and costume-like. I ordered the XL and it would not button over my breasts. For reference I’m size 38DDD. If you have smaller breasts or size up for this dress though I imagine it would work just fine. The tie and straps come separate, attaching the tie was easy to figure out but attaching the straps was impossible to get right. Also I agree with other reviews, there is a weird smell when it first comes in but one or two washes would probably fix it. Ended up returning this dress in the end because it could not button over my breasts though.

The fabric is very costume like fabric. It’s definitely made for smaller body types and smaller busts, I got a large and it still definitely doesn’t fit unfortunately I’m 5”0 120 lbs and about a 34DD just for reference so no one regrets buying it like me ! Other than that it’s a very cute piece, I’ll definitely give it to a friend.

评论概述: Hilariously awful don’t waste your money
评论详情: First of all it’s thin. Runs small which I already figured. The waistline isn’t at your waist. No. It’s halfway up your boobs. God forbid you even have a semblance of titty cuz it ain’t gonna snap closed. It REEKS of fish?????? The belt is so cheap it doesn’t even stay. Like you clip one but to the back and then buckle separate pieces to it that clip to the front and it just keeps slipping out of the buckle leaving a really dumb looking dangly piece of fabric. The tie is one of those cheap zip ties which I personally don’t mind but whatever. The dress is also missing key details that are shown in the picture. All in all, not worth the $28. It’s worth $3 at a cheap Halloween store at BEST. I’m honestly really sad about this not only cuz I just wasted money BUT I had hopes cuz other reviews were good. Turns out they are pretty misleading.
